Entries.default: This harpsichord is finely crafted, detailed and lavish, but the keys are well-worn.
The harpsichord emits a sad, twangy sound when you depress one of its keys.
The row of wooden keys links to an exposed set of strings. Tapping the keys triggers a small quill to strum each associated string.
After glancing around to ensure no one's watching, you place the bomb inside the harpsichord and rig one of its strings as a detonator.
